title: Two People
provenance_text:
Carl-Henning Pedersen [1913-2007], Copenhagen, Denmark. James L. Winokur [1922-2009], Pittsburgh, PA, by June 1968; partial gifts to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, 1977 to 1984 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The work was lent by Mr. and Mrs. James L. WInokur to "Exhibition of Paintings, Watercolors, and Drawings by Carl-Henning Pedersen" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh PA, October - December 1968 (no. 89.) See also copies of correspondence dated June 17, 1968 in curatorial file.
[2]. The work was accessioned as a 1977 year-end partial gift on February 9, 1978. It was received at the museum on December 31, 1984. Committee action on completion of the gift as a 1984 year-end gift was taken on February 7, 1985.
